Students learn how to interpret various protocols such as TCP/IP, HTTP, HTTPs, SMTP and FTP. We examine the entire flow and life-cycle of data-packet movement from origin to destination. The course examines the role of DNS and SMTP servers in routing internet traffic and email transmissions. Mechanism to safeguard the movement of data, such as network routers, ports and firewalls, are also explored.<\/p><p>Students are then introduced to the web development process and planning stages of building websites and complex web applications. We conduct an overview of web hosting infrastructures such as shared, VPS, Dedicated and Cloud hosting solutions through case analysis. We then take a look at the role of Domain name registrars and ICANN (The Internet Corporation for Assigned Names and Numbers). Students learn to register and administer domain names through the GoDaddy domain management console. Management features such as Name Server assignment, auto-renewal, domain privacy, and domain forwarding will be covered.<\/p><p>With first-hand insights into the creation of effective web infrastructures and domain management, students learn to configure local testing servers. This includes installing and configuring WAMP/MAMP (Windows/MAC, Apache, MySQL, PhpMyAdmin) on a PC or MAC system. We discuss the role of each essential service as it applies to testing dynamic, database-driven web applications on a local computing system.<\/p><p>Students then explore the configuration of a live production server using popular cloud hosting providers such as Linode. This includes deployment and administration of Ubuntu on Linux based distributions and essential web services (LAMP Stack - Linux, Apache, MySQL, PhpMyAdmin) on scalable virtual machines. Several remote access tools such as PuTTy and Terminal will be used to administer virtual servers through the use of command lines. Servers will be configured with security in mind, using multi-user accounts, SSH authentication, and file permission management.<\/p><p>Students also learn to install and connect to their virtual machines using remote desktop connection tools such as Tight VNC and Real VNC. The entire Linode management console will be explored to demonstrate how to complete various tasks including: creating backups, server re-sizing, changing root passwords, DNS management, and general administration.<\/p><p>Lastly, the course takes a look at FTP clients and establishing connections from local machines to production servers to upload web content. We will explore the FileZilla interface and provide demonstrations on uploading, deleting and modifying remote server files.<\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Web Developers<\/li><li>Cloud Server Administrators<\/li><li>Students who want to build a Web Application<\/li><li>Students who want to Deploy a Testing or Production Web Server<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u66-show-more--7\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}

{"twitter_image":"https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/480x270/4260384_4064_3.jpg","site":"https://www.udemy.com/course/insight-to-post-pandemic-importance-of-lean-six-sigma/?couponCode=TIMEFORGLORY3","course_language":"English","is_free":"true","description":"Learn and Master the Most Incredible Six Sigma White Belt Online Training Course!","id":"#98","title":"Insight to Post Pandemic: Importance of Lean Six Sigma","category":"Teaching & Academics","url":"insight-to-post-pandemic-importance-of-lean-six-sigma","course_description":"<div class=\"ud-text-sm component-margin styles--description--33-vq\" data-purpose=\"course-description\"><h2 data-purpose=\"description-title\" class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--description__header--2Z7Vb\">Description<\/h2><div class=\"show-more-module--container--2QPRN\"><span id=\"u220-show-more--6\" data-type=\"checkbox\" data-checked=\"\" style=\"display:none\"><\/span><div class=\"show-more-module--content--cjTh0 show-more-module--with-gradient--1ZDrA\" style=\"max-height:none\"><div tabindex=\"-1\"><div data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p>Welcome to this ultimate course on <strong>\"Insight to Post Pandemic: Importance of Lean Six Sigma\" <\/strong>that contains vaulable lessons taught by \"Casey Ang\" and \"Srinidhi Ranganathan\".<\/p><p>Since its introduction as a corporate strategy by Jack Welch at General Electric in 1995, Six Sigma has come a long way. Since then, it has been widely adopted in a variety of industries.<\/p><p>The Greek letter sigma is used by statisticians to represent the variation in a process and we all know that. Six Sigma is usually defined as \u201cA fact-based, data-driven philosophy of improvement that favours defect prevention over defect detection\".<\/p><p>Six Sigma practitioners have created a variety of methodologies over the years to make the approach to these initiatives consistent and driven by tactics that have proven successful over time. Six Sigma aspires to do the following - in general:<\/p><ul><li><p>Determine a problem.<\/p><\/li><li><p>Gather information about the problem's occurrence process.<\/p><\/li><li><p>Develop prospective problem-solving data-driven solutions.<\/p><\/li><li><p>To determine the best alternative, put the solutions to the test.<\/p><\/li><li><p>Create a system that will allow you to maintain a long-term solution.<\/p><\/li><li><p>Analyze the data and make any necessary adjustments. <\/p><\/li><\/ul><p>Let's get down to what this online course talks about. This course teaches you the fundamentals of Six Sigma. It not just helps with change management within your company but also helps your organization to prepare for the new normal. Customer expectations or demands are constantly changing in this world governed by technology. Six Sigma's emphasis on customer satisfaction enables the company to produce higher-quality products and increase customer loyalty over time. A product-focused strategy compares the product to the products of competitors in order to reach or slightly exceed such levels. You must know that Six Sigma focuses on minimising process variation and improving process control, whereas lean encourages work standardisation and flow by eliminating waste (non-value added processes and procedures).<\/p><p>Please note that to achieve success leveraging the Six Sigma methodology, organisational processes must have a failure rate of no more than 3.4 per million (99.99966%) chances. A Six Sigma defect is anything that isn't according to the client's specifications. Its goal is to reduce the amount of variation in commercial and production operations. The capacity to focus on producing quantitative and measurable financial gains from any Six Sigma project is one of the most notable features. Employees can identify problem areas as well as reoccurring difficulties that affect the overall quality expectation of a service or product from a customer's perspective using Six Sigma methodology.<\/p><p><strong>Why opt for this course - the proven game-changer?<\/strong><\/p><p>By completing this<strong> \"Lean Six Sigma White Belt Online Course\"<\/strong>, you will gain the basic understanding of what Lean Six Sigma is and how Lean Six Sigma brings a plethora of benefits to your organization. <\/p><p>If you are a professional individual who wants to grow and sustain in this ever-changing competitive world (where speed is no longer just a good to have criteria) and want to discover a way to fit in the new norms with their employees - this course is for you to learn and master!<\/p><p><em>This mind-blowing White belt course will walk you through unbelievable insights and learning that you don't want to miss at all as a newbie entering the world of Lean Six Sigma. What's more? We will teach you the five core skills of Lean Six Sigma that can be leveraged for individuals. We will also showcase the Lean Six Sigma organizational structure for better understanding of the concept topic. Other than that, we will discuss the salary range (in general) of various Lean Six Sigma Belts. These concepts will serve to be very interesting. All you need is passion and interest to learn and master this course!<\/em><\/p><p>Enroll now and let's start learning. There is no time to wait at all. <\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Individuals who are interested in getting to learn the first introductory overview of Lean Six Sigma and the immense benefits it offers.<\/li><li>Business leaders and owners who are considering to implement Lean Six Sigma programs in their organization.<\/li><li>Employees and organisations that require a structured approach to problem solving in order to improve quality management continuously.<\/li><li>Anyone who is interested to become a Lean Six Sigma Practitioner<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u220-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}

This transition affects both consumers (gym goers) and suppliers (gyms/personal trainers) now more than ever before. Por ello en este curso aprenderas a desarrollar con JavaScript diferentes rutinas y funciones enfocadas al desarrollo de un juego, aunque tales conocimientos igualmente puedes orientarlos a tus propios objetivos.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>que es javascript?<\/strong><\/p><p>JavaScript es un lenguaje de programación que los desarrolladores utilizan para hacer páginas web interactivas. Desde actualizar fuentes de redes sociales a mostrar animaciones y mapas interactivos, las funciones de JavaScript pueden mejorar la experiencia del usuario de un sitio web. Como lenguaje de scripting del lado del servidor, se trata de una de las principales tecnologías de la World Wide Web. Por ejemplo, al navegar por Internet, en cualquier momento en el que vea un carrusel de imágenes, un menú desplegable \u201cclick-to-show\u201d (clic para mostrar), o cambien de manera dinámica los elementos de color en una página web, estará viendo los efectos de JavaScript.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>¿Qué es la programación orientada a objetos ?<\/p><p>La programación orientada a objetos (Object Oriented Programming, OOP) es un <strong>modelo de programación informática que organiza el diseño de software en torno a datos u objetos, en lugar de funciones y lógica<\/strong>. Un objeto se puede definir como un campo de datos que tiene atributos y comportamiento únicos.<\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">¿Para quién es este curso?<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Diseñadores y desarrolladores Web<\/li><li>Desarrolladores de Juegos<\/li><li>Interesados en la programacion web<\/li><li>Interesados en JavaScript<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" aria-label=\"Mostrar más descripción\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u143-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Ver más<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Ver menos<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}

The tests may focus on the following areas:<\/p><ol><li><p>Managing files using command-line tools: Questions in this area may include tasks such as creating and deleting files, moving and copying files, and setting permissions on files and directories.<\/p><\/li><li><p>Making links between files: Questions in this area may include tasks such as creating hard and soft links, and understanding the difference between them.<\/p><\/li><li><p>Matching file names with shell expansions: Questions in this area may include tasks such as using wildcard characters to match multiple files, and using the \"ls\" command with shell expansions to list files that match a specific pattern.<\/p><\/li><li><p>Redirecting output to a file or program: Questions in this area may include tasks such as redirecting the output of a command to a file, and piping the output of one command to another command.<\/p><\/li><li><p>Editing text files from the shell prompt with vim: Questions in this area may include tasks such as opening a file in vim, editing the file, and saving the changes.<\/p><\/li><li><p>Changing the shell environment: Questions in this area may include tasks such as setting environment variables, creating and modifying shell scripts, and running commands in a different environment.<\/p><\/li><\/ol><p>The test aims to assess the students' understanding of the basic Linux commands that are commonly used in the Linux environment, and their ability to perform tasks related to managing files and manipulating the shell environment. The test would be suitable for IT professionals such as system administrators, network engineers, and developers who work with Red Hat Linux systems, and students studying computer science or related fields who are learning about Linux systems and want to gain practical experience.<\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>IT professionals such as system administrators, network engineers, and developers who work with Red Hat Linux systems.<\/li><li>Students studying computer science or related fields who are learning about Linux systems and want to gain practical experience.<\/li><li>Users who are new to Red Hat Linux and want to learn how to navigate and work with the system.<\/li><li>IT enthusiasts who want to learn about Red Hat Linux and improve their skills.<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u69-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}

It is a skill that requires physical habits. That is why you will be asked to take part in numerous exercises where you record yourself speaking on video, and then watching yourself. Learning presentation skills is like learning how to ride a bicycle. You simply have to do it numerous times and work past the wobbling and falling off parts until you get it right.  <\/p><p>  This <strong>public speaking<\/strong> course contains numerous video lectures plus several bonus books for your training library.  <\/p><p>  TJ Walker has been coaching and training people on their presentation skills for 30 years. We are glad you could join us on this exciting new learning expedition!<\/p><p>In this course, we are going to be exploring one of the most powerful Web Server technologies available. One that has grown in popularity exponentially since its release - Yes, we are talking about NGINX.<\/p><p>Whether you are an experienced web developer or new to the industry, you\u2019ve likely heard of the age-old debate between Apache and NGINX. Which one is better, what should you use? This course offers a great introduction into NGINX. We will be covering several important topics, such as:<\/p><ul><li><p>Understanding the difference between Apache &amp; NGINX<\/p><\/li><li><p>Installing NGINX on a Digital Ocean Droplet or any Virtual Server of your choice.<\/p><\/li><li><p> Modifying the NGINX Block Configuration file for hosting Websites<\/p><\/li><li><p>Installing essential components on NGINX such as MySQL, PHP &amp; PhpMyAdmin<\/p><\/li><li><p>Securing PhpMyAdmin using symbolic links and NGINX\u2019s built in authentication gateway.<\/p><\/li><li><p>Securing your hosted websites with free SSL using Certbot &amp; Let\u2019s Encrypt<\/p><\/li><li><p>Installing and Configuring WordPress on your NGINX Server<\/p><\/li><\/ul><p>We will be using Digital Ocean droplets for this course, but you can create a virtual server with any cloud hosting provider of your choice. The configuration steps would be the same, regardless of who you host with. Also, we will be using the latest LTS version of Ubuntu (18.04).<\/p><p>So, if you are ready to dive back into another course and learn a variety of new concepts, hit the sign-up button!<\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Students interested in learning about NGINX<\/li><li>Students interested in learning the differences between Apache &amp; The software is open-source, and is designed for maximum performance and stability. It also aims to correct many of the short-falls of Apache, when it comes to delivering content to your end user. {"twitter_image":"https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/480x270/1998896_a9d3_2.jpg","site":"https://www.udemy.com/course/quickbooks-payroll-quickbooks-pro-desktop-2019/?couponCode=7629E405E1E6FFB3EE2F","course_language":"English","is_free":"true","description":"Processing QuickBooks Pro Desktop 2019 payroll for a small business, generating paychecks, processing payroll tax forms","id":"130","title":"QuickBooks Payroll - QuickBooks Pro Desktop","category":"IT & Software","url":"quickbooks-payroll-quickbooks-pro-desktop-2019","course_description":"<div class=\"ud-text-sm component-margin styles--description--33-vq\" data-purpose=\"course-description\"><h2 data-purpose=\"description-title\" class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--description__header--2Z7Vb\">Description<\/h2><div class=\"show-more-module--container--2QPRN\"><span id=\"u135-show-more--7\" data-type=\"checkbox\" data-checked=\"\" style=\"display:none\"><\/span><div class=\"show-more-module--content--cjTh0 show-more-module--with-gradient--1ZDrA\" style=\"max-height:none\"><div tabindex=\"-1\"><div data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p><strong>QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2019 payroll will describe the payroll process for a small business in detail, so bookkeepers, accountants, and business owners can better understand how to set up payroll, process payroll, and troubleshoot problems related to payroll. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>This course will introduce the payroll set-up in the QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2019 system, walking through payroll screens for both the paid version and the free manual version of payroll within QuickBooks Desktop. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>We will discuss payroll legislation that will affect payroll calculations within QuickBooks Pro Desktop 2019 and list the payroll forms we will need to generate from Quickbooks. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>The course will walk through the process of entering a new employee into the QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2019 system and describe where the data would be received from in practice including Form W-4. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>We will discuss Federal Income Tax (FIT) calculations within QuickBooks Pro Desktop 2019. The course will describe how FIT is calculated, what is needed for QuickBooks Pro to calculate FIT, and how to enter the data into the accounting system. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>The course will describe the Federal Income Contributions Act (FICA) and its components. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>We will calculate social security and describe how QuickBooks Pro Desktop 2019 will help with the calculations as we process payroll. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>The course will calculate Medicare and describe how QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2019 will help with the calculations of Medicare when we process payroll. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>We will calculate Federal Unemployment (FUTA) and discuss how FUTA is related to state unemployment (SUTA). <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>The course will describe and calculate employer taxes and discuss which taxes are employee taxes and which taxes are employer taxes. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>We will describe payroll journal entries and discuss how payroll data is populated in the QuickBooks reports and financial statements including the profit and loss and balance sheet. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>The course will describe and fill out a payroll register and analyze the many payroll reports that can be generated from QuickBooks Pro Desktop 2019. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>We will discuss and enter both mandatory and voluntary deductions into the QuickBooks Pro Desktop 2019 system. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>The course will discuss retirement plan options, how to enter them into the QuickBooks Pro Desktop 2019 system, and how they are used to calculate net income and payroll taxes. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>We will cover two comprehensive problems, processing payroll within QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2019. One comprehensive problem will use the paid QuickBooks version. The second comprehensive problem will use the free manual version and compare the computations to ones we will do in Excel. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>Our first comprehensive problem will start off very basic with one employee and will increase in complexity as we enter more benefits and payroll details each year. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>Our second comprehensive problem will focus on manual calculations to get a better understanding of what the paid version is really doing for us. A better understanding of the calculations being made by the QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2019 system allows us to spot and troubleshoot problems when they happen.<\/strong><\/p><p><strong>In addition to the instructional videos, this course will include downloadable   <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>\u2022    QuickBooks Pro Desktop 2019 Backup files<\/strong><\/p><p><strong>\u2022    Excel practice files<\/strong><\/p><p><strong>\u2022    Downloadable PDF Files   <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>The QuickBooks Desktop 2019 backup files are a great tool that allows us to jump ahead in the material or to rework material if we choose. <\/strong><\/p><p><strong>Excel practice files will be preformatted and will generally have at least two tabs, one tab with the completed work and a second tab with a preformatted worksheet we can fill in as we watch the instructional videos.    <\/strong><\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Bookkeeper who want to learn how to use QuickBooks payroll<\/li><li>Business owners who want to learn QuickBooks payroll<\/li><li>Accounting students who want a better understanding of payroll concepts and how they are used in accounting software<\/li><li>Business professionals who want a better understanding of how payroll works<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p><strong>クラウドデジタルリーダー資格試験とは何ですか？<\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p>クラウドデジタルリーダー資格試験は、候補者のクラウドコンピューティングとデジタル変革の知識とスキルを評価するために設計された包括的な試験です。試験は、クラウドアーキテクチャ、クラウドコンピューティングモデル、クラウドセキュリティ、クラウドオペレーション、クラウド移行、デジタル変革などのトピックをカバーします。試験は、Cloud Credential Councilによって管理され、クラウドコンピューティングおよびデジタル変革の分野での候補者の能力を厳しく評価するために設計されています。<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>なぜクラウドデジタルリーダー資格試験を受験するのか？<\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p>クラウドデジタルリーダー資格試験は、クラウドコンピューティング業界の知識と経験を実証する素晴らしい方法です。この認定は、今日のデジタル世界で競争力を高め、スキルと経験を証明することで他から目立つことを可能にします。さらに、この認定は、あなたのキャリアを進め、クラウド業界で新しい仕事機会を開く手助けとなります。<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>なぜクラウドデジタルリーダー試験コースを受講するのか？<\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p>クラウドデジタルリーダー試験コースは、望むクラウドアーキテクトが資格試験を準備するのを助けるように設計されています。これは、最も重要なトピックに関する指導、サンプル質問、練習テストを提供し、マテリアルをよりよく理解するのに役立ちます。さらに、コースは、試験を勉強し、合格する方法についての専門的なアドバイスを提供します。このコースを受講することで、クラウドの資格を取得し、クラウドアーキテクトとして成功するための助けとなります。<\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">このコースの対象受講者:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>ITプロフェッショナル<\/li><li>ビジネスリーダー<\/li><li>クラウドアーキテクト<\/li><li>ソフトウェアエンジニア<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" aria-label=\"説明の詳細を表示\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u89-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">もっと見る<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">表示件数を減らす<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}

This practice test is the most efficient way to quickly ace the PL-900: <strong>Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals<\/strong> with a great score.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>There are no specific prerequisites recommended for the Microsoft Power Platform Fundamentals or PL-900 certification exam. However, candidates must note that prior experience in the required skills for the exam can be beneficial for their success. Most important of all, candidates must have the capabilities for the understanding of business value associated with Power Platform and the core components of Power Platform.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>The Accélérez votre travail en utilisant la macro VBA pour automatiser les actions répétitives. Application JAVA EE 8 Complète d'achats d'articles stockés dans une Base de Données via une interface Web HTML <\/p><p>Il explique aussi les interactions entre les servlets et les JSPs et les redirections vers des pages statiques et/ou dynamiques afin de vous amener à bien comprendre le modèle MVC <\/p><p>Nous allons aussi expliquer comment créer des sessions les récupérer et les invalider.<\/p><p> Nous allons illustrer le mécanisme des Cookies par des exemple complets.<\/p><p>L'application  de Commande en Ligne que nous allons développer va permettre d'accéder à une Base de Données via JDBC. <\/p><p><br><\/p><p>Un utilisateur authentifié peut consulter la liste de ces commandes de voir la liste des produits disponibles et de sélectionner ceux qu'il veut rajouter. <\/p><p>Il peut aussi voir la liste de ces articles  avant de finaliser sa commande.<\/p><p>Cette application  utilisera une base de donnée existante sous NetBeans.<\/p><p><strong>Pré-requis :<\/strong><\/p><p>Des connaissances en <strong>Java<\/strong> (telles que les notions de classes, objets, héritage et exceptions) sont indispensables.<\/p><p><strong>Environnement de Développement:<\/strong><\/p><ul><li><p>NetBeans 12.4<\/p><\/li><\/ul><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl !<\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">À qui ce cours s'adresse-t-il ?<\/h2><ul In reality, there are many different parts of our lives that impact our physical and mental states.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>By taking an online course, you can learn about how your lifestyle affects the way you feel and move towards taking control of your wellbeing.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>Practicing mindfulness and focusing on your mental and physical well-being can help lower stress and improve your attention span, as well as make you sleep better and decrease loneliness. We sense the love of God in disobedience","id":"166","title":"The Book of Jonah: Insightful Overview & Life Applications","category":"Teaching & Academics","url":"the-book-of-jonah-insightful-overview-life-applications","course_description":"<div class=\"ud-text-sm component-margin styles--description--33-vq\" data-purpose=\"course-description\"><h2 data-purpose=\"description-title\" class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--description__header--2Z7Vb\">Description<\/h2><div class=\"show-more-module--container--2QPRN\"><span id=\"u143-show-more--6\" data-type=\"checkbox\" data-checked=\"\" style=\"display:none\"><\/span><div class=\"show-more-module--content--cjTh0 show-more-module--with-gradient--1ZDrA\" style=\"max-height:none\"><div tabindex=\"-1\"><div data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p>Contrary to popular misrepresentation, this minor prophetic book is not about the great or big fish. <\/p><p>It is the great big God.<\/p><p>The God who shows, love, mercy and compassion even in the of events that cry for justice. <\/p><p>It is about God and His immanent activities on the earth.<\/p><p><br><\/p><ol><li><p>In this we see Jonah fleeing his mission (chapters 1\u20132)<\/p><\/li><li><p>We see him purporting to give up on his and take to flight (1:1\u20133)<\/p><\/li><li><p>We hear the endangered sailors cry to their gods (1:4\u20136)<\/p><\/li><li><p>We witness the exposure of Jonah's disobedience. (1:7\u201310)<\/p><\/li><li><p>We suffer with Jonah's punishment and deliverance (1:11\u20132:1;2:10)<\/p><\/li><li><p>We respond with resounding hallelujahs to his prayer of thanksgiving (2:2\u20139)<\/p><\/li><li><p>Here Jonah is reluctantly fulfilling his mission<\/p><p>(chapters 3\u20134)<\/p><\/li><li><p>We are somewhat elated by Jonah's renewed commission and obedience (3:1\u20134)<\/p><\/li><li><p>Surprisingly, the endangered Ninevites' repent and appeal to the Lord (3:4\u20139)<\/p><\/li><li><p>God acknowledges the Ninevites' repentance. (3:10\u20134:4)<\/p><\/li><\/ol><p>Eventually Jonah' himself is  delivered from and rebuked for his racist and vengeful attitude (4:5\u201311)<\/p><p>Jonah is a book which, as all the books of the Bible, seek to do, serves as a mirror to the depths and dark interstices of our souls. It's a book that calls for repentance that leads to transformation.<\/p><p>Join me in this study as we unravel the truth about athe book of Jonah.<\/p><p>This course will be continuously updated as I discover other insights about the subject, hence I employ you to return to it again and again.<\/p><p><strong>So lets get started!<\/strong><\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Bible study enthusiast<\/li><li>New or growing believers<\/li><li>Anyone seeking the truth about God<\/li><li>Youth Leaders<\/li><li>Sunday school teacher<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u143-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}

Affirmations help improve mental strength, introduce new positive ideas, reinforce existing positive ideas, all in the hope of creating positive outcomes. They also help focus the mind on positive thoughts and outcomes.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>Affirmations increase Your chances of getting the outcomes You truly desire and sometimes NEED to reflect in Your world or the world around you.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>Please note, Affirmations are used as a part of a wider approach in striving towards a desirable life. It is also a process and requires dedication, discipline, adaptability and flexibility.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>Affirmations are NOT a replacement for taking action. <\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p>They are to support you in getting to solutions for issues you face in life. They help:<\/p><p>1). Empower the Affirmer that they can engage with the issues at hand<\/p><p>2). They help reframe the problems to make less overwhelming<\/p><p>3). They support the affirmer toward solutions<\/p><p><br>Not all affirmations are suitable for everyone. They are fundamentally circumstance driven and need to be adapted to address the specific areas one is looking to improve for the associated outcomes.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>This approach should improve the quality of life, for yourself and those around you.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>The Affirmations in this course should serve as prompts, reminders, a guide or leads but can also be used verbatim. <\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>I would encourage you to also develop your own Affirmations and make them more personal. It is the best way to get outcomes associated with the practice of Affirmations. <\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>Who are they for?<\/strong><\/p><p>They are for everyone and anyone. Whatever the situation or circumstance, there are suitable affirmations. If NOT, you can create them. The beauty is that they can be constructed by anyone who needs them, including You.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>Why?<\/strong><\/p><p>As the world seems to be a complicated space, being able to inject some form of influence or more control into our lives.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>Do they work?<\/strong><\/p><p>Affirmations help get people in the right mindset, one which they have designed, to work towards better lives. <\/p><p>They are seen as a much needed channel for individuals to attempt to influence their own lives in the direction they want.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>Some people attribute their successes to the practice of Affirmations.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>What aspects of Life can these be applied?<\/strong><\/p><p>They can be applied to ALL aspects of life. <\/p><p><br><\/p><p>In this course, we'll focus on four big aspects, with sub-sections. If so, you are in the <strong>RIGHT <\/strong>place.<\/p><p><strong><br>How many times have you found yourself having to study and being stressed?  Not being able to get started, and procrastinating? When you get enough traction to learn for 2 minutes, and then your focus shifts somewhere else\u2026<\/strong><\/p><p><strong>Does that seem familiar?<\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p>Hi there!<\/p><p>My name is Marcel. I am a <em>Life Coach<\/em> and a <em>Scientist<\/em>, and I have studied for many many years. In fact, to this date, I continue learning every day while working on a full time job. Since very little, I have been obsessed with productivity and how to do things faster and better, and learning more quickly always seemed like a superpower. If I could learn fast, I thought, I can do whatever! I can learn it all by myself!<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>Let me tell you a little bit of my story...<\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p>I remember <em>vividly <\/em>that day. I was in front of my notes. I had to study for the \u2018Antennas\u2019 exam for my telecom bachelor. I thought two days were enough to learn a whole semester of material. However, I was confident I could do it. I had attended all the lectures and did the exercises, and although it all felt like a ball of concepts that were not yet understood and untangled, I was confident I could pass that exam.<\/p><p>The first hour of studying was challenging. I started realising that there were many concepts that I needed to learn, and there was no time to slow down! I had to go fast, as I only had two days to study! Three hours later, I was in a café wondering if it made sense to continue studying. I continued a bit more until my brain could endure and went home.<\/p><p>The following day was even more complicated. Not necessarily the material, which I could not get properly, even a single thing with that feeling of rushing, but it was my head telling me that there was no chance to do well in that exam. There was frustration and a lot of negative self-talk. In the end, I didn\u2019t even go to the exam. I gave up and failed without even trying.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>I was crushed...<\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p>If I had taken the time to simplify the concepts and go one step at a time, then that ball of complex facts I needed to know where we were coming from would not have been there in the first place. But I procrastinated. I waited until the end to study, deluding that that could be any good. Not only that, but I also failed three more subjects, passing only one out of five subjects that semester. That is quite devastating for a person who has never really failed any subject.<\/p><p>As I reflected on what happened, I thought I did not see things from the proper perspective or was not studying well. So then, I started learning how to do things better and more straightforwardly and be more productive while enjoying the study time. I attended courses and read all the books and articles that were crossing in front of my eyes.<\/p><p>Afterwards, I started getting really good scores, honours in some subjects, to finally obtain a Ph.D. in medical imaging, a career as a scientist in industry, as well as a second career as a Life Coach.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>I made many mistakes...<\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p>For this reason, I designed this step by step course <strong>to skyrocket your studying skills<\/strong> with all this in mind. Not only that but also to lower your stress levels. In the beginning, it <strong>might feel strange<\/strong>. But, almost as if you are cheating, because<strong> you will feel less stressed, you will find yourself having more fun and accomplishing way more<\/strong>.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>In this course, I take you  through the skills necessary to gain affinity in the five main concepts that will get you to mastery in your studies.<\/p><p><br><\/p><ul><li><p><strong>Clarity<\/strong><\/p><\/li><li><p><strong>Energy<\/strong><\/p><\/li><li><p><strong>Information Quality<\/strong><\/p><\/li><li><p><strong>Study Strategies<\/strong><\/p><\/li><li><p><strong>Focus<\/strong><\/p><\/li><\/ul><p><br><\/p><p>If you master them all, you will be years ahead of your current version, and I want to witness that, so please do not forget to send me a message explaining how you achieved it! You are the reason this course exists!<\/p><p>Within the course, we will first start by looking at <strong>time management<\/strong>. Specifically, how to efficiently process the vast amount of information we receive daily. First, we will form the basis of a <strong>system <\/strong>that handles all the information. Then, we will talk about the importance of <strong>motivation, mood, nutrition, and exercise<\/strong>, <strong>the role they play in learning<\/strong>, and how to use them in our favour to enhance our learning capabilities. Then, we will learn a technique to create <strong>our study guide<\/strong>, a guide that will turn unstructured documentation into a highly customised learning highway. Effective use of time and recall is the following topic, where we will learn techniques to use time and recall efficiently the information we have previously known, as well as strategies as necessary as the use of <strong>spaced repetition<\/strong> with software like <strong>Anki<\/strong>. Last but not least, we will discuss <strong>focus<\/strong>, an essential aspect of learning to decrease study time while maximising <strong>productivity<\/strong>.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>Here is some amazing feedback<\/strong><\/p><p>*****  <strong>Ignacio Paz <\/strong>Agile Coach<\/p><p>This is a fantastic course that helps me to improve my time to get things done and adopt techniques to achieve my goals! <\/p><p><br><\/p><p>***** <strong>David Bofill <\/strong>Data Science Lead<\/p><p>Great content, easy to follow and understand. Learning presentation skills is like learning how to ride a bicycle. You simply have to do it numerous times and work past the wobbling and falling off parts until you get it right.  <\/p><p>  This <strong>public speaking<\/strong> course contains numerous video lectures plus several bonus books for your training library.  <\/p><p>  TJ Walker has been coaching and training people on their public speaking skills for 30 years. Probably the most valuable thing a manager does for a company is get the most efficient performance from employees. Motivating your team to reach their full potential is your job. If you think about it, a coach's role can be defined the same way. Having managers as coaches helps them understand each employee's unique strengths.<\/p><p>It's interactive; coaches listen, but they also respond to feedback. You build trust and engagement when you act on feedback. Like most companies, you have a variety of channels for communicating with your employees, like virtual bulletin boards, announcements, and updates.<\/p><p>Coaches provide structured advice and guidance to people in management or leadership roles through coaching in management development. It's to help managers get better at their job, improve their performance, and advance their career.<\/p><p>Can you tell me what it's like to be a training manager?<\/p><p>Different companies and industries have different training managers. In general, they teach and train employees and make sure they're competent and skilled. In addition, they run the company's employee training department.<\/p><p>Training a manager is very crucial. Why?<\/p><p>Management skills training makes managers more effective at their jobs, so they can drive team success. Make management training a priority and you'll impact your team's morale and your company's success.<\/p><p>I'll teach five major topics in this master's course.<\/p><p>1. What management coaching and manager training are and why they're so valuable<\/p><p>2. Coaching and training for managers: roles and principles<\/p><p>3. {"twitter_image":"https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/480x270/4865770_4d79_3.jpg","site":"https://www.udemy.com/course/introduction-to-drinking-water-treatment/?couponCode=30EF8EDB986A1BFCFD07","course_language":"English","is_free":"true","description":"What you need to know about how drinking water gets to your faucet","id":"192","title":"Introduction to Drinking Water Treatment","category":"Teaching & Academics","url":"introduction-to-drinking-water-treatment","course_description":"<div class=\"ud-text-sm component-margin styles--description--33-vq\" data-purpose=\"course-description\"><h2 data-purpose=\"description-title\" class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--description__header--2Z7Vb\">Description<\/h2><div class=\"show-more-module--container--2QPRN\"><span id=\"u150-show-more--6\" data-type=\"checkbox\" data-checked=\"\" style=\"display:none\"><\/span><div class=\"show-more-module--content--cjTh0 show-more-module--with-gradient--1ZDrA\" style=\"max-height:none\"><div tabindex=\"-1\"><div data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p><em>You drink water every day and use it for hygiene, gardening, cleaning, and other applications,<\/em><\/p><p><em>But how much do you really know about tap water?<\/em><\/p><p><br><\/p><p><em>In this course, we will discuss drinking water treatment from many angles according to the following plan :<\/em><\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>· First, we will address data about access to safe drinking water around the world,<\/strong><\/p><p><strong>· After that, we will talk about the importance of providing safe water to consumers and the risks of untreated water,<\/strong><\/p><p><strong>· Then, we will discuss water cycles in urban and natural areas,<\/strong><\/p><p><strong>· Next, we will explain how the process of water treatment works,<\/strong><\/p><p><strong>· And in the following chapter, we will address the challenges related to ensuring access to drinking water around the world,<\/strong><\/p><p><strong>· Finally, we will see how we can help save water in our homes and act responsibly.<\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p><em>By the end of this course, you will have more knowledge about how raw water is treated and turned into safe drinking water. You will also learn why it is important to ensure safe water in order to avoid the dangerous consequences of unsafe water. You will also become more aware of the challenges that threaten safe water supply around the world and how you can help save water at your home and act responsibly.<\/em><\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Anyone interested in learning about drinking water treatment, and looking for clear and simplified information.<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u150-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}
{"twitter_image":"https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/480x270/4996242_c105.jpg","site":"https://www.udemy.com/course/sacred-places-in-hindu-temple/?couponCode=FREE_SA_223","course_language":"English","is_free":"true","description":"An Introduction to the sacred spaces and places of Hindu Temple in India","id":"193","title":"Sacred Places in Hindu Temple","category":"Personal Development","url":"sacred-places-in-hindu-temple","course_description":"<div class=\"ud-text-sm component-margin styles--description--33-vq\" data-purpose=\"course-description\"><h2 data-purpose=\"description-title\" class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--description__header--2Z7Vb\">Description<\/h2><div class=\"show-more-module--container--2QPRN\"><span id=\"u90-show-more--6\" data-type=\"checkbox\" data-checked=\"\" style=\"display:none\"><\/span><div class=\"show-more-module--content--cjTh0 show-more-module--with-gradient--1ZDrA\" style=\"max-height:none\"><div tabindex=\"-1\"><div data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p>A Hindu place of worship is called a mandir or temple. A temple is dedicated to a particular god or goddess (deity). The temple is the god's home on earth. The holiest part of the temple is an inner shrine called a <strong>garbhargriha<\/strong> with a statue to the god or goddess. \u200b<\/p><p>\u200b<\/p><p>This inner shrine is under a towering roof called a sikhara. The four corners of the temple then have smaller shrines. The temple is entered through the ardhamandapa or entrance porch. \u200b<\/p><p>\u200b<\/p><p>Hindu temples are often decorated with the figures of gods and goddesses. <\/p><p>A Hindu place of worship is called a <strong>mandir<\/strong> or temple. A temple is dedicated to a particular god or goddess (deity). The temple is the god's home on earth. The most holy part of the temple is an inner shrine called a garbhargriha with a statue to the god or goddess. This inner shrine is under a towering roof called a sikhara. The four corners of the temple then have smaller shrines. The temple is entered through the ardhamandapa or entrance porch. Hindu temples are often decorated with the figures of gods and goddesses. Outside Hindu temples you can often buy gifts or prasad to give the deity honored in the temple.<\/p><p>There is no set schedule for visits to a temple. Worshippers go when they want. When entering a temple, visitors must take off their shoes and women cover their heads to show respect. The ceremony that follows is called puja. It includes prayer and a viewing of the statue of the god or goddess honored. Offerings of fruit, flowers and incense are made to a priest who presents them to the deity. After the deity blesses the gifts they are returned to the worshipper and their heads are marked with a red dot or blessing called a tilaka. Worshippers then circle the inner shrine with their right hand raised in respect to the deity.<\/p><p>It is also very common for Hindus to worship at a home shrine, often as a whole family. There might be a statue or just a picture of the god or goddess. The shrine also contains things which represent the five senses. The idea is to draw the whole person into worship through the image or statue and the senses. The goal is to get beyond self to Brahmin. A bell is also often rung to help focus the mind.<\/p><p>The Ganges River is a very sacred place to Hindus. It is a place to go on pilgrimage to bathe in sacred waters. Hindus also like to have their ashes scattered in the Ganges after cremation.<\/p><p>Outside Hindu temples, you can often buy gifts or prasad to give the deity honored in the temple.\u200b<\/p><p><br><\/p><ul><li><p>To highlight the sacred places in Hindu Temple\u200b<\/p><\/li><li><p>To out the sacred spaces in Hindu Temple\u200b<\/p><\/li><li><p>To find out the significance of sacred symbols in Hindu Temple.<\/p><\/li><\/ul><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Bachelor<\/li><li>Masters<\/li><li>Researchers<\/li><li>PhD scholars<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u90-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}
{"twitter_image":"https://img-b.udemycdn.com/course/480x270/4951256_0e02_3.jpg","site":"https://www.udemy.com/course/basics-of-political-science/?couponCode=POL_BASICS_0223","course_language":"English","is_free":"true","description":"An Introduction to understand political science","id":"194","title":"Basics of Political Science","category":"Teaching & Academics","url":"basics-of-political-science","course_description":"<div class=\"ud-text-sm component-margin styles--description--33-vq\" data-purpose=\"course-description\"><h2 data-purpose=\"description-title\" class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--description__header--2Z7Vb\">Description<\/h2><div class=\"show-more-module--container--2QPRN\"><span id=\"u79-show-more--6\" data-type=\"checkbox\" data-checked=\"\" style=\"display:none\"><\/span><div class=\"show-more-module--content--cjTh0 show-more-module--with-gradient--1ZDrA\" style=\"max-height:none\"><div tabindex=\"-1\"><div data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p>Political science is <strong>the study of politics and power from domestic, international, and comparative perspectives<\/strong>. It entails understanding political ideas, ideologies, institutions, policies, processes, and behavior, as well as groups, classes, government, diplomacy, law, strategy, and war.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>August Comte opined that theories are the conceptual lenses through which we can sort out the plethora of facts that we confront daily. In fact, without theories, we might not be able to identify something as a fact at all. There are some features of a good theory. The first virtue is parsimony which implies frugality. A theory should be parsimonious to forgo unnecessary speculation and confusing details. The second feature of a sound theory is accuracy. Theories must be sufficiently detailed to allow for accurate assessments and explanations of the world. An elegant theory simply yet precisely interprets, describes, explains, or predicts some aspect of the world. However, these virtues are mostly identified as features of scientific theories. The explanatory and predictive behavior of natural sciences is not found in social sciences as too many uncontrolled and unforeseen forces affect political and social life and that is why social and political practices are seldom replicable. In light of these problems, some experts have argued that social scientists should not try to mimic the natural sciences; instead, they should develop their own standards and procedures. <\/p><p><br><\/p><p>For theorists of social and political life, therefore, the ability to feel and think in ways similar to the object of study is a crucial component of their task. In the West, political theory emerged out of political philosophy on one hand, and political thought, on the other. But it should be remembered that political theory is different from both. It differs from political philosophy in the sense that it is less formal and atomistic and less concerned to establish logical relationships between individual political concepts. Political theory is different from political thought by being less historical in focus. Thus, political theory is an essentially mixed mode of thought. It not only embraces deductive argument and empirical theory but combines them with normative concern, so acquiring a practical, action-guiding character. It is an attempt to arrive at a comprehensive, coherent, and general account of the sorts of things that we talk about when we discuss politics. A good political theorist is able to move between social conditions and political concepts. Political theory must involve a good deal of knowledge of political practice. Another aspect of political theory is that it is always defined by the specific situations and problems political thinkers have witnessed. <\/p><p><br><\/p><p>To understand political theory, we need to understand both the history of ideas on which the thinkers draw and the problems they considered themselves to be facing and to which their work was addressed. Studying the context in which political theory originally arose allows us to critically assess whose particular interests it reflected.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><strong>CONTENT<\/strong><\/p><p><br><\/p><p>UNIT - 1: Introduction. 3<\/p><p>UNIT - 2: State and Sovereignty. 8<\/p><p>UNIT - 3: Law and Political Obligations. 8<\/p><p>UNIT - 4: Basic Political Values. 8<\/p><p>UNIT - 5: Democracy. 8<\/p><p>UNIT - 6: Political Ideologies. 8<\/p><p><br><\/p><p><br><\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Bachelor<\/li><li>Masters<\/li><li>Law students<\/li><li>Researchers<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u79-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}

Aprenderás los conceptos básicos de las opciones sobre acciones, cómo se utilizan como herramienta de compensación, y cómo pueden impulsar la motivación y el compromiso de los empleados. El curso incluye ejemplos prácticos de herramientas que facilitan la creación y gestión de un plan de stock options. <\/p><p><br><\/p><p>Las stock options tienen ciertos beneficios sobre otras formas de compensación. Primero, están más vinculadas al éxito a largo plazo del negocio que otras formas de compensación; si una compañía hace bien, entonces sus acciones se elevan y los titulares de stock option recibirán el beneficio. Esto les da un incentivo adicional para trabajar arduamente con el fin de mejorar la compañía en lugar de sólo cumplir con los objetivos inmediatos.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>Además, las stock options pueden ser menos costosas para la compañía que otros tipos de incentivos porque no hay ningún costo inicial para ella aparte del costo administrativo asociado con configurarlas. Además, el valor total del paquete de compensación puede ser significativamente mayor debido al potencial apreciable en el precio de las acciones más adelante en el tiempo. Por último, esta forma especial de remuneración tiene cero impuestos hasta que se ejerce la opción, lo que significa que los colaboradores tendrán acciones con valor sin tener que desembolsar grandes cantidades de capital inicialmente.<\/p><p><br><\/p><p>Al final del curso, tendrás una comprensión profunda de cómo las stock options pueden ser una parte valiosa de una estrategia de compensación efectiva para atraer y retener a los mejores talentos en tu empresa.<\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">¿Para quién es este curso?<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Profesionales que quieren implementar un plan de Stock Options en su compañía<\/li><li>Empleados quieren entender mejor este incentivo<\/li><li>Expertos de Recursos Humanos<\/li><li>Fundadores<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" aria-label=\"Mostrar más descripción\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u150-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Ver más<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Ver menos<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}

{"twitter_image":"https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/480x270/5160514_17c2_2.jpg","site":"https://www.udemy.com/course/car-electrician-and-car-tuning-course-car-repair/?couponCode=STAGE_2_TUNING","course_language":"English","is_free":"true","description":"Master the art of automotive electrical systems with our Car Electrician Training course! Be Pro with Car Tuning Course","id":"198","title":"Car Electrical Systems and Tuning: Stop Breaking your car !","category":"Teaching & Academics","url":"car-electrician-and-car-tuning-course-car-repair","course_description":"<div class=\"ud-text-sm component-margin styles--description--33-vq\" data-purpose=\"course-description\"><h2 data-purpose=\"description-title\" class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--description__header--2Z7Vb\">Description<\/h2><div class=\"show-more-module--container--2QPRN\"><span id=\"u69-show-more--7\" data-type=\"checkbox\" data-checked=\"\" style=\"display:none\"><\/span><div class=\"show-more-module--content--cjTh0 show-more-module--with-gradient--1ZDrA\" style=\"max-height:none\"><div tabindex=\"-1\"><div data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p>Welcome to our comprehensive Car Electrician Training course! This course is specifically designed to provide you with the knowledge and practical skills you need to become a successful car electrician. We\u2019ll guide you through the basics of electricity and the complexities of car tuning so you can master the art of car repair.<\/p><p>This course is perfect for beginners who are looking to learn the fundamentals of car electrician training, as well as for seasoned professionals who want to advance their knowledge in the field. Throughout the course, you\u2019ll gain a deep understanding of electrical systems and their components, and you\u2019ll learn how to diagnose and fix common problems.<\/p><p>The course is structured in a way that is easy to understand and follows a logical progression. We start with the basics of electrical theory and move on to the more advanced topics of car tuning and repair. Along the way, we\u2019ll provide you with practical, hands-on exercises to help you develop your skills.<\/p><p>The first module of the course covers the basics of electricity. You\u2019ll learn about Ohm\u2019s Law, electrical circuits, and the principles of voltage, current, and resistance. You\u2019ll also gain a thorough understanding of the components that make up an electrical system, such as batteries, alternators, and starters.<\/p><p>The second module covers the most important tools and equipment that you\u2019ll need as a car electrician. You\u2019ll learn about the different types of multimeters, oscilloscopes, and diagnostic tools, as well as the various types of wire and cable that are used in electrical systems.<\/p><p>The third module covers car tuning. You\u2019ll learn how to diagnose and fix common electrical problems such as alternator failure, battery drain, and starter issues. You\u2019ll also learn about advanced topics such as wiring harnesses, grounding, and circuit protection.<\/p><p>The fourth module is dedicated to car repair. You\u2019ll learn how to diagnose and fix common mechanical problems, such as engine failure, transmission issues, and suspension problems. You\u2019ll also learn about the different types of tools and equipment that are used in car repair, as well as safety procedures that are essential when working on cars.<\/p><p>The final module of the course covers the business side of car electrician training. You\u2019ll learn about how to set up a successful car electrician business, including marketing, pricing, and customer service. You\u2019ll also learn about the different types of certifications and licenses that are required to operate a car electrician business, as well as legal and financial considerations.<\/p><p>By the end of the course, you\u2019ll have the skills and knowledge you need to become a successful car electrician. You\u2019ll be able to diagnose and fix common electrical problems, tune a car for optimal performance, and perform advanced repairs on all types of vehicles. You\u2019ll also have a solid understanding of the business side of car electrician training, which will help you build a successful career in this exciting field.<\/p><p>Enroll today and take the first step towards becoming a skilled car electrician!<\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Beginner Car Tuners and Electricians<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u69-show-more--7\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}

{"twitter_image":"https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/480x270/5049506_6782_2.jpg","site":"https://www.udemy.com/course/sales-forecasting-sales-management-forecasting-models-sales-skills/?couponCode=BEF0F6724B79A6121EDF","course_language":"English","is_free":"true","description":"Forecasting, Sales forecasting, Forecasting model, Time Series Analysis, B2B sales, Sales management, Sales skills","id":"206","title":"Master Course in Sales Forecasting and Sales Management 2.0","category":"Business","url":"sales-forecasting-sales-management-forecasting-models-sales-skills","course_description":"<div class=\"ud-text-sm component-margin styles--description--33-vq\" data-purpose=\"course-description\"><h2 data-purpose=\"description-title\" class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--description__header--2Z7Vb\">Description<\/h2><div class=\"show-more-module--container--2QPRN\"><span id=\"u132-show-more--6\" data-type=\"checkbox\" data-checked=\"\" style=\"display:none\"><\/span><div class=\"show-more-module--content--cjTh0 show-more-module--with-gradient--1ZDrA\" style=\"max-height:none\"><div tabindex=\"-1\"><div data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p>Master course in sales forecasting and sales management 2.0 : The process of estimating future sales (revenues) is called sales forecasting. Although this seems daunting at first, it can actually be done fairly painlessly with some application. The key to forecasting sales is to understand the underlying assumptions and drivers of sales, then track and manage them.<\/p><p>A forecast can be described as an indication of what's likely to happen in a certain field in the future. In other words, a sales forecast tells you how much of a particular product is likely to sell in a specified market at a specified price in the future.<\/p><p>The ability to forecast sales accurately is key to a business' ability to produce the right amount at the right time. In addition, raw materials, equipment, and labor are all arranged in advance. The material is generally produced in advance in order to meet future demand, but some firms manufacture by order.<\/p><p>The process of estimating future work, like sales, includes estimating quantity, type, and quality. Having a thorough assessment of market trends is very critical for any manufacturing company. Future planning of the entire company depends on this forecast from the sales department.<\/p><p>What is sales management?<\/p><p>In sales management, you develop a sales force, coordinate sales operations, and implement sales techniques so you can hit sales targets consistently.<\/p><p>An effective sales management strategy is essential for any business. No matter what industry you're in, precision sales management processes are always the key to managing sales and boosting performance. Effective sales managers inspire and lead their teams.<\/p><p>Your sales management system can also help you stay in touch with your industry as it grows, which can make all the difference between surviving and flourishing. This course will execute the lecture concepts with Forecasting, Sales forecasting, Forecasting model, Time Series Analysis, B2B sales, Sales management and Sales skills.<\/p><p>This master course will cover 5 major topics: <\/p><p>1. Introduction and importance of sales forecasting and sales management 2.0<\/p><p>2. How to build a sales forecast for your business<\/p><p>3. Types, techniques and methods of sales forecasting in sales management<\/p><p>4. Sales forecasting using machine learning<\/p><p>5. Sales management in sales and distribution management<\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>All UG and PG business and marketing students, Sales Organizations, Sales Executives, Marketing Executives, Business Directors, Owners and Interested learners to learn about sales foreacasting and Sales management.<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u132-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}
{"twitter_image":"https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/480x270/2907194_e2a6.jpg","site":"https://www.udemy.com/course/understanding-hipaa-compliance/?couponCode=65168DDB2B063E75B866","course_language":"English","is_free":"true","description":"This course helps you understand the various rules under HIPAA and how to be compliant with that.","id":"207","title":"Understanding HIPAA Compliance","category":"Business","url":"understanding-hipaa-compliance","course_description":"<div class=\"ud-text-sm component-margin styles--description--33-vq\" data-purpose=\"course-description\"><h2 data-purpose=\"description-title\" class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--description__header--2Z7Vb\">Description<\/h2><div class=\"show-more-module--container--2QPRN\"><span id=\"u197-show-more--6\" data-type=\"checkbox\" data-checked=\"\" style=\"display:none\"><\/span><div class=\"show-more-module--content--cjTh0 show-more-module--with-gradient--1ZDrA\" style=\"max-height:none\"><div tabindex=\"-1\"><div data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p>This course gives you a basic understanding of the US regulation, Health Insurance Portability and Accountability Act of 1996 or HIPPA as it is commonly known. The training provides a broader view of the legal and governing background of HIPAA along with the various rules and standards associated with it. In recent years, with the increase in the number of health data breaches, HIPAA has gained a lot of prominence in the healthcare arena. While cyberattacks and ransomware attacks add to the agonies of health insurers and providers, HIPAA assures security and protection.<\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Anyone with access to Protected Health Information<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u197-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}
{"twitter_image":"https://img-c.udemycdn.com/course/480x270/4741312_7b69_3.jpg","site":"https://www.udemy.com/course/car-flipping-earn-money-from-selling-used-cars-ocsaly/?couponCode=OCSALY_ACADEMY_FEB","course_language":"English","is_free":"true","description":"Learn how to buy and sell cars and how to make profit from it ! You will Learn from the best Business and Make Profit !","id":"208","title":"Car Flipping : The Art of Car Business in 90 Minute ! |2023+","category":"Business","url":"car-flipping-earn-money-from-selling-used-cars-ocsaly","course_description":"<div class=\"ud-text-sm component-margin styles--description--33-vq\" data-purpose=\"course-description\"><h2 data-purpose=\"description-title\" class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--description__header--2Z7Vb\">Description<\/h2><div class=\"show-more-module--container--2QPRN\"><span id=\"u115-show-more--6\" data-type=\"checkbox\" data-checked=\"\" style=\"display:none\"><\/span><div class=\"show-more-module--content--cjTh0 show-more-module--with-gradient--1ZDrA\" style=\"max-height:none\"><div tabindex=\"-1\"><div data-purpose=\"safely-set-inner-html:description:description\"><p>There\u2019s a HUGE difference between simply operating a used car dealership business and operating a profitable used car dealership. To get a better idea of the possible demand for used cars in your area, you\u2019ll need to crunch some numbers. By knowing the number of used cars sold in your area every year and month , you can estimate what percentage of the market you will be likely to be able to corner and reach. By locating the average profit per vehicle, you can get an approximate idea of how much profit and money your dealership able to make per year. While the groundwork associated with opening a dealership can be time-consuming, expensive, and demanding, the real test of your dealership\u2019s viability doesn\u2019t begin until after you open your doors to the public. Without the right management of your dealership, all the effort you put into laying the foundation will be wasted. While each state has its own rules and regulations, there are several important universal aspects of operating a car dealership and tips on how you can get the most out of your investment. Your customers are the single most important factor in the success or failure of your business, so taking the time to identify who they are and what they care about is absolutely vital. Take a look at the types of cars you plan on selling, then do some research to determine the age, gender, and income level of the average individual who owns those types of vehicles. Later down the line, this will allow you to tailor your marketing and advertising efforts toward those who are most likely to be interested in what you have to offer. Make sure to base any of your conclusions regarding your target clients on real actionable data; don\u2019t simply make assumptions.<\/p><p><br><\/p><\/div><div class=\"styles--audience--2xuzW\" data-purpose=\"target-audience\"><h2 class=\"ud-heading-xl styles--audience__title--1qhlO\">Who this course is for:<\/h2><ul class=\"styles--audience__list--16EaN\"><li>Beginner Used Car Business Leaders<\/li><\/ul><\/div><\/div><\/div><button type=\"button\" class=\"ud-btn ud-btn-medium ud-btn-ghost ud-heading-sm show-more-module--focusable-label--19jtd\" style=\"display: none;\" data-css-toggle-id=\"u115-show-more--6\"><span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\">Show more<\/span><span class=\"show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\">Show less<\/span><\/span><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-more--2bohq\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-expand\"><\/use><\/svg><svg aria-hidden=\"true\" focusable=\"false\" class=\"ud-icon ud-icon-xsmall show-more-module--show-less--1J4F5\"><use xlink:href=\"#icon-collapse\"><\/use><\/svg><\/button><\/div><\/div>"}
